title: Web Development
description: I build fast, responsive, and dynamic web applications using cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Mobile Development
description: I develop high-performance mobile applications using React Native and Flutter, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience.

title: Backend Development
description: I design and implement robust APIs and comprehensive database solutions using Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase.

title: Full-Stack Development
description: I provide end-to-end solutions, handling both frontend and backend development to deliver cohesive and fully functional web and mobile applications.

title: Consulting & Optimization
description: I offer performance audits and technical consulting services to help you choose the right technologies, design scalable architectures, and implement best practices.
